bastes.description: A sizzling hot spice, and then some.
Tongue-tingling heat, not for the faint hearted.
Heaps of flavour with just a flicker of fire.
Tangy orange meets smooth, sweet maple syrup.
Zesty and tangy. A tastebud teaser.
No added spice. As mild as it gets.
Deliciously sweet with a hint of BBQ.
